import React,{useState} from 'react' import Nav from './Nav' import {Taka,Stars} from "./Components" import axios from 'axios' import Navigation from './Navigation-ash' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' const Reviewer = () => { let location = useLocation() let data = location.state let context = useContext(Context) let id = context.user? context.user : null let url2 = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' let [star,setStar] = useState(0) let [writing,setWriting]=useState('') let [img,setImg]=useState() let pk = data.id let sender = [id,pk,writing,img,star] let HandlePost =()=>{ //axios function //productID,username,star,writing,images axios.post(url,{data:sender}) .then((response)=>{ console.log(response.data) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) } console.log(data) console.log(star) return (

{data.name}

{data.story}

setWriting(e.target.value)} value={writing} placeholder="Write your own review" type="text" className="rev">
{setImg(e.target.files)}} type="file"/>
) } export default Reviewer
